description: This requirement is for Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services

full_summary:
=================
### National Capital Region (NCR) Tender Notice

#### Solicitation Information

* **Request for Proposal (RFP) Number:** S4398645-EN578-172870
* **Tender Type:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Region of Tender:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Location:** Ottawa, ON (K2H8G1)
* **Required Services:** Temporary Help Services
* **Description:** Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking Temporary Help Services from qualified suppliers under the Supply Arrangement EN578-172870.

#### Stream and Category Information

* **Stream:** 5.1 Computer, Application Support
* **Category:** Temporary Personnel Services

#### Eligible Suppliers

A total of 15 suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

1. 1019837 Ontario Inc.
2. ACOSYS CONSULTING SERVICES INC./ SERVICES CONSEILS ACOSYS INC., THE HALIFAX COMPUTER CONSULTING GROUP INC. (Joint Venture)
3. Advanced Chippewa Technologies Inc.
4. Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
5. Equasion Business Technologies Consulting Inc
6. Excel Human Resources Inc.
7. Fanar Enterprise Solutions Inc.
8. inRound Innovations Incorporated
9. Lionel Drouin
10. MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
11. Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
12. PCAire Inc.
13. Quarry Consulting Inc.
14. Robertson & Company Ltd.
15. Valcom Consulting Group Inc.

#### Proposals Submissions

* **Proposal Opening Date:** Not specified
* **Proposal Submission Deadline:** Not specified

#### Contracting Information

* **Department of National Defense (DND)**: Ministry of Defence
* **Contract Manager:** CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* **Contract Email:** [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
* **Contractor Contact:** 613-971-795

#### Security Requirement

* **Security Level:** Secret
* **Security Clearance:** Requirement information isSecretonly

#### Tender Files and Documents

* **Tender Notice:** Available on [CanadaBuy](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6198/s4398645-method-1---right-fit
